lenders.name: Charitable Giving
lenders.loan_because: I like the feeling I get inside that comes from knowing I've helped enrich the lives of international global residents. It truly is a win/win situation for all involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I strive to help others see the joys in joy life by spreading good cheer and giving positive encouragement. Sports are a terrific outlet for stress, and a chance to spend time with those who share common interests. Although it sometimes can't be avoided, nobody wants to work out in the field all day or be tied to their desk all day; people innately want to have fun! Get out and play with your friends and family whenever you can - - softball, bocce ball, soccer, hiking, even a walk in the park - - fun moments in sports and nature translate into good memories that stay with you long after you're finished playing.

lenders.name: Rev. Francis
lenders.loan_because: We needed a loan to expend our farms
lenders.occupational_info:
The COMPASSION EVANGELISTIC TEAM initiates and undertakes community development projects that are aimed at teaching the people to be self-reliant so as to be able to help themselves and others.

Our community development projects includes the following
1. Health, Medical and Sanitation: Under this venture we educate the rural poor on good health practices, the role of family planning as a health factor in community development, HIV/AIDS awareness creation and preventive measures.

2. Farming and Agro-Processing: The 21st century is presenting the world with major challenges in agriculture production. The rural poor who forms the bulk of the world’s population always finds it difficult crossing the informational gap to have adequate access to information regarding modern good farming practices. Wings of Love strive to bridge the information gap by making available at the doorsteps of the rural poor information regarding good farming methods, more yielding crops and also helps them initiate agro processing ventures to add value to their farm produce.


3. Creating small scale industries: We believe there will not be any meaningful development without the ability to develop and establish Small Scale Industries that help the rural poor produce some of the products they need regularly thereby creating jobs for the youth. We do our best to identify ventures that will serve the mutual interest of both the community and the investor.



4. Establishing Libraries: Vital Information, the key to sustainable development is lacking in many African Communities. We try to address this situation by providing libraries for communities and donate books to school libraries especially those in the rural communities.

5. Providing recreational facilities for the youth of low-income communities. The U.N convention on children clearly gives and established the right of children to play. Many children in developing countries are denied this very important right.   CET will always seek to address these issues.

6. Providing Quality education opportunities for the innocent children that find themselves in the deprived communities we reach. In many communities Wings of Love have visited children have to walk several miles in other to attend school. The smaller kids have to wait and grow till they can really make the daily journey to school on their own. This has resulted in many kids not been able to make it to school at all. We work with the communities to provide quality education for the innocent children whose desire is to go to school.



7. Providing training opportunities though the establishment of Vocational and Trade learning institutions.

8. Working in partnership with other like minded organizations that seeks to improve the living conditions of all mankind

These projects and programs will always be designed to improve on the general quality of life in the communities in which they are situated.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to give back
lenders.occupational_info: I work with individuals & teams who are typically going through difficult & intense times, up to & including crisis. I support them in cultivating the opportunities created in those extreme circumstances.

lenders.name: Camille
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful to be comfortable in my life and want to help others live a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in a variety of jobs for local government.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: Matthew 25:40 tells us "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me."
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but worked for my state government legislature.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: Most financial aid sent directly to 3rd world countries is abused by corrupt governments. Microloans sent directly to the people help lift a country out of the third world from the bottom up.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm involved in selling luxury furniture that no one really needs to people with more money than they deserve.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward - every individual's success is success for us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the State administering a program that funds environmental clean-ups.   I also am an entrepeneur and have an internet business which allows people to host their own website & advertise their own businesses (blogging etc).

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to help, hardworking entrepreneurs in developing nations, have an opportunity for a better life.  Now that I have been lending for awhile and after reading the book -International Bank of Bob, I now understand one loan, is more than likely to lead to multiple loans.  This allows borrowers to grow and make a positive impact for their families.  They are then able to provide their kids an affordable education, which ultimately gives them a better life.  It exactly like most of our parents and elders have worked hard and sacrificed for us.  It’s a pretty simple straight forward formula, that has been shown to work over and over again.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the water treatment field selling chemicals and equipment to the Municipal and Industrial accounts.  I’m obviously happy to see that Kiva has started a sector in the attributes field for water and sanitation.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.occupational_info: I make hand made violins and I play the violin.

lenders.name: jeanne
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a large daily newspaper writing stories about interesting people and events.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others realize their heart desires
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people in the process of awakening to their true self.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I try to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage property to upgrade and improve buildings, houses and other structures.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.occupational_info: I manage websites for a Hollywood film studio.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.

lenders.name: Leigh Anne
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me abundantly and I want to share what He has given me with others.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: If I can't do big things, I can at least do little things with great love.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare new teachers to go scrape some crud off this crazy, graced world.

lenders.name: Tavane
lenders.loan_because: I lend because the people participating in the kiva project are ambitious, hard working people who need a little support. The amount of money that most of them need is nothing to what we waste on silly things every day.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at one of the largest banks in the world.  I support corporate customer in the money management and cash flow needs.

lenders.name: Despina
lenders.loan_because: we all have an obligation to step back and lend a hand to those behind us.  No matter how badly off we think we are - help the ones worse of than you.

lenders.name: Okenji
lenders.loan_because: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared. - Buddha
lenders.occupational_info: A vegetarian Buddhism who is inspired by the code of bushido: Justice, benevolence, love, sincerity, honesty, and self-control in utmost respect.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: We adopted our son from Guatemala and want to lend a hand to people in Guatemala
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university, running a training program for students who want to make the world a better place for children and families (by applying research to public policy)

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I like to share.
lenders.occupational_info: My  work involves being creative and spontaneous. If you see a home, office, castle or other environment that actors are in I've helped to create that  world. I have the good fortune of using my imagination regularly.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Isidoro
lenders.loan_because: entrepreneurship is what drives capitalism to succeed.  It is what will pull the developing world out of 'development.'

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: it empowers and enables people to remain/become self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I revitalize neighborhoods.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I am also a father, husband and entrepreneur!  I am thrilled to be a part of person-to-person micro-lending and supporting sustainable development.  My loans are biased towards women and women's groups.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the managing directory of a consultancy in Toronto, Canada that helps our clients bridge the gap between business needs and technology by providing research, strategy, implementation and support services.

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: it is a way I can use the gifts I have been given in ways that will bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am a college student studying religion and English, and I have hopes to be a person that promotes peace, love, and community (that's the goal at least).

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I like people who work and know the value of integrity.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
I can, and a handful of pounds here means a lot more to someone else. It's not a sacrifice for me but it is a lifeline for someone else.

The highest for of charity is setting someone up on their own 2 feet. So why not help people along ojn that journey.
lenders.occupational_info: Satisfying, but working in marketing makes other companies money and is not "giving back" which is what I'd ideally like to do.

lenders.name: TeleFlow
lenders.loan_because: this is a great idea, and similar to why we created TeleFlow. By empowering people to help themselves, we create a society where people are sucessful and self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: We created TeleFlow, and application development toolkit, that allows developers to create, test and deploy their own telephony applications.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed
lenders.occupational_info: Rewarding

lenders.name: Moritz
lenders.loan_because: It's very cool, to see, that small helps, that don't hurt any lender, can help. It has only advantages.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying Physics in Frankfurt, Germany.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping developing nations is more than just giving cash away and giving them equipment.  Aid has to be sustainable, and by helping these people improve their lives with micro loans, we're promoting an environment where they'll take matters into their own hands.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.occupation: Annual Campaign Coordinator at Social Service Agency

lenders.name: KUBALEK
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute to relieving others of the humiliation and pain of extreme poverty, and to foster entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lenders.name: Marcella
lenders.loan_because: I can help make a difference in someone's life at a rate I can afford.
lenders.occupational_info: In my 80 years I have been blessed to work and travel in many places in the world as an Army Officer, College Professor and Social Worker to name a few of the hats I have worn. I still work in my daughter's firm where  she reimbursed all her staff for the first loan we made.   There was always a helping hand in our lives.  I have been a volunteer and love passing the word about  Kiva as an alternative to giving nonlasting gifts to friends and relatives,

lenders.name: Melyssa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others, and this is a way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunities and freedoms that I have in Canada.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer and designer and I also sell photobooks, greeting cards and other photo-based products on my website.  My stock photography is available through several  royalty free distributors.   I am a member of the Microstock Group Lending Team.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Others need it more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: College Student

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.occupation: Author of \"The Giving Zone\" and Speaker

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, in all the places you can, to all the people you can, as long as you ever can.  John Wesley
lenders.occupational_info: Face painting, teaching art and craft classes, volunteering.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: I sincerely care about people and want everyone to have a chance at success.  I especially admire those who can turn a negative situation into a challenge and learn from experience.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.occupation: own small trucking business with my husband.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: people need a little help.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small business which I run out of my home.  I manage the careers of musicians, helping them with publicity; promoting their music and finding them work.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: SoulVoyagers
lenders.loan_because: We love the idea of lending money where it can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of spiritual women that meet weekly to discuss issues of personal and world peace.

lenders.name: Appropedia Friend
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do with capital I accumulate.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and engineer open source appropriate technology to help build a sustainable world.

lenders.name: Topher Hamblett
lenders.occupation: President, The Foundation for West Africa
lenders.loan_because: economic self-sufficiency is about individuals and families working their way out of deep poverty.   It is about intiative and hope.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is about supporting West African-led efforts to achieve lasting peace and prosperity.  The Foundation for West Africa supports the start-up of community radio stations, and local initiative in health care and education.

lenders.name: Shelley & Robert
lenders.loan_because: We are very excited to contribute to small business owners who are willing to share there dreams with the rest of the world and impact and improve their local community.
lenders.occupational_info: We manage Top Climb Publishing which owns web sites and search hot-sheets that provide internet users ways to find the specific information, product or service they are seeking on the Internet. We strive to provide relevant, simple and most importantly, helpful ways for people to find the resources they need to solve problems and accomplish their goals!

lenders.name: Cori & Tim
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed by others who have helped us and we feel strongly that the best thing to do is to pass that along.
lenders.occupational_info: We record and report business transactions for the companies that we work for.

lenders.name: Jimmy
lenders.loan_because:
"If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth." 1 John 3:17-18

"...to loose the chains of injustice and untie the cords of the yoke, to set the oppressed free and break every yoke? Is it not to share your food with the hungry and to provide the poor wanderer with shelter-- when you see the naked, to clothe him, and not to turn away from your own flesh and blood?" Isaiah 58:6-7

Matthew 6:19
Do not lay up for yourselves treasures on earth, where moth and rust destroy and where thieves break in and steal; but lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust destroys and where thieves do not break in and steal. For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.

Matthew 19:21
"... Go, sell your possessions and give to the poor, and you will have treasure in heaven.  Then, come, follow me."


Luke 9:23-25
Then he said to them all: "If anyone would come after me, he must deny himself and take up his cross daily and follow me. For whoever wants to save his life will lose it, but whoever loses his life for me will save it. What good is it for a man to gain the whole world, and yet lose or forfeit his very self?

Hebrews 13:5
Keep your lives free from the love of money and be content with what you have, because God has said, "Never will I leave you; never will I forsake you."

Acts 2:44-45
All the believers were together and had everything in common. Selling their possessions and goods, they gave to anyone as he had need.


"He raises the poor from the dust and lifts the needy from the ash heap; he seats them with princes and has them inherit a throne of honor." 1 Samuel 2:8

"But when you give a banquet, invite the poor, the crippled, the lame, the blind." Luke 14:13

"Religion that God our Father accepts as pure and faultless is this: to look after orphans and widows in their distress and to keep oneself from being polluted by the world." James 1:27
lenders.occupational_info: I write, perform, and record for my band "The Northern" in New York City.

lenders.name: Richard & Mary
lenders.loan_because: Jesus calls us to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I do computer software support and development for a printing company. My wife provides speech therapy for special needs children in public schools.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I am awesome

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I respect those who work hard for themselves and I don't mind trying to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work a bit in different industries. Sometimes I repair or expand homes to make them more useful. I also repair trucks and overseas shipping containers.

lenders.name: The Wilsons
lenders.loan_because: Our children were each given money  to do something good in the world.  They chose to combine their money and help someone reach a goal.  Perhaps this money will "keep giving" for years to come.

lenders.name: Warren
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves through entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I stink with money and helping people with theirs is better than buying farkles and doodads.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a county funded hospital mandated to serve people's health needs regardless of their ability to pay. There is emphasis on immigrant, poor, transient, and incarcerated populations. I am trying to get into med school

lenders.name: J.P.
lenders.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day.  Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."  I know the small amount I contribute will allow businesses to grow and in turn, lift whole communities out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an economics student.

lenders.name: Candace
lenders.occupational_info: I work in sustainable fisheries. We work to ensure there are fish left in the oceans for generations to come.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: to help the world around me.

lenders.name: Amara
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help great businesses and organizations brand, market, and advertise themselves!

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want to pay if forward, better peoples live and better the world
lenders.occupational_info: I do counseling with people to help guide them on their self awareness journey

lenders.name: Action Packed David
lenders.loan_because: its easy to do and it helps others...
lenders.occupational_info: don't really like "work", rather I work at what I am passionate about...

lenders.name: Jeff,Donna,Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help people.  Especially those who are hard workers and can repay the loans so we can help others and pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: Insurance industry.

lenders.name: margie
lenders.loan_because: ...  aid ... as an acronym.....  access, independence, development.   : )     the least i can do is help with access!
lenders.occupational_info: when not working in the developed world .. i love to volunteer and travel in the 3rd world

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because:
It is so satisfying and rewarding.  Such a small gesture on my part is transformed into real benefits and real assistance in other people's lives. Giving in this way supports my belief in co-operation. The combination of the many being so much greater than I could do on my own.

I always smile when I see my loans repaid to know that history has been repeated in that I have passed on some little of the help I have been given in my life

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe in microfinance and I wish to give my little contribution to help who needs it
lenders.occupational_info: I am a researcher in the field of fair trade and ethical finance, I also work in the Youth Policies Department of a regional public administration in Italy (Puglia)

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who aren't as fortunate as I am achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help develop computer software for a government agency that provides public assistance to people in need.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to share what I have with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain the library's collection of resources to help put knowledge in the hands of the public.

lenders.name: Col & Jas
lenders.occupation: Being present with Joy and Grace.
lenders.loan_because: Life is good.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping to move around the planet, the most ancient traveller in the cosmos... LOVE!

lenders.name: James M Hill High School
lenders.loan_because: The Miramichi Kinsmen Club approached James M Hill High School to participate in the KIVA program.  World Issues teacher, Tyson Theriault enthusiastically introduced the concept to his class and they researched different entrepreneur opportunities and decided to lend $500 to two different groups.
lenders.occupational_info: The Miramichi Kinsmen Club is a non-profit service club that organizes various fund raising activities and contributes the proceeds back to the community's greatest need.

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because: Social justice is an important value for me, and I'm convinced that microfinance can really make a difference in lifting people out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working in a research lab.

lenders.name: Jersey Girl
lenders.loan_because: I want to....I don't have a lot...but I have more than others...
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an airline...and I travel all over the world....

lenders.name: Doreen & Hugh
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: It pays some of the bills and is better than a life of crime.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: if the world needs help, it takes a lot of it to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: current military solider

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Kiva struck me as a personal way I could directly help some of the hardworking, abjectly poor, especially in Africa.
lenders.occupational_info: My work focuses on projects in  the neediest spots in Africa, where frequent travel constantly exposes me to the plight of the majority.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I paint to connect with people, and I launch rockets to pay the bills.

lenders.name: Star Straf
lenders.loan_because:
People have helped me when I needed it, I try to give to those that I have something in common with, for example my first loan was to a weaver because I have a small loom.

My Kiva Friends 
http://www.kiva.org/lender/andrew8285
http://www.kiva.org/lender/holly8249
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer inside the beltway

lenders.name: Boris
lenders.loan_because: I want to honor my brother, Boris.

lenders.name: Ana Lomba
lenders.loan_because: As a small entrepreneur, I know how difficult it is to get started--and how empowering it is as well! I want to help other people achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I create materials (fun!) for children to learn new languages or improve their skills in their home languages. I believe that the world would be a better place if we learned to speak with others--in their languages!

lenders.name: Maggie & Mario
lenders.loan_because: we are all here to help each other and we should pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: I collect money from people for product they purchased on credit.

lenders.name: Hamel College
lenders.loan_because:
We care! 
Kiva gives you the possibility to reach people.Borrowers en entrepreneurs can make a change together.
lenders.occupational_info: Sharing knowledge.

lenders.name: Debbie and Sox
lenders.loan_because: For once in my life, I can!  Just want to help out someone in need.  I think it's harder to ask for and accept help when you need it the most.  I like donating this way as it makes it much more personal.  I have been in situations where I needed help and got it.  Would like to do the same in return for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am managing a call center for a large pharmaceutical company.  We take orders over the phone and process them to our large warehouse.

lenders.name: Denis
lenders.loan_because: It feels good and I think microlending has macro benefits.
lenders.occupational_info: I detect and diagnose disease.

lenders.name: Kit
lenders.loan_because: my stepdaughter introduced me to kiva.org.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide financial services.

lenders.name: Yazcara
lenders.loan_because: I am alone with two children, I do work on Real estate and the colapse of the economy let me with no income, Now I do puting a marketing company, what is my career. I can take care of my children and work same time

lenders.name: Sami
lenders.loan_because: I'm a nice person and want to help people :)

lenders.name: Susan Nick
lenders.loan_because: a single person can help another with the simple press of a button - People matter, each and every one.
lenders.occupational_info: small business accounting services

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I think this a great way to promote entrepreneurship and to give those in third-world and developing countries an opportunity to improve their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I negotiate and push paperwork for large commercial real estate loans and asset-based financing.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with much.  I want to help other women to feel empowered and to have good self esteem about themselves and to have the ability to take care of themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my time cooking,reading, hiking, skiing and traveling. I try to stay active with local charities and non-profits. However, my primary interest is to spend quality time with my husband and my three adult children who live around the world.

lenders.name: Istvan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Saundra
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I'm thankful for what has been given to me in my life and wish to pay it forward

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I would rather spend my money on something worth while than gratuitous materialism
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Marquette University studying history.  I plan on teaching at the collegiate level at some point in my life.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to be reasonably successful in business and think micro-lending is a great way to both give back and to help those who are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company facilitates online Employee & Client Satisfaction surveys for professional service firms around the world.  The information we provide to business leaders allows them to improve the quality of the service they provide to their clients and make their workplace/culture better for their employees.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a meaningful, positive change in the world and Kiva allows me to do that within my means.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Montessori school.  It allows children to learn at their own pace, not racing to keep up with their peers.  Children help other children and learn responsibility and self-motivation.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: It works.

lenders.name: Angelina
lenders.loan_because: it is wonderful to know you can help someone so far away.

lenders.name: Sabrina
lenders.loan_because: My Daddy says it will make a better world for when I grow up.
lenders.occupational_info: I make my Mommy and Daddy happy just by being me.

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people better their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design and create engaging learning materials for kids on the web.

lenders.name: Ashley & Aris
lenders.loan_because: Our friend Billy gave us a Kiva gift certificate for our wedding and we are so excited to be able to help individuals around the world with their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: We design & build websites for small and medium sized businesses.  We also do photography, print design, and film production.

lenders.name: Tihana
lenders.loan_because: Why not?!

lenders.name: Kareem Grant
lenders.loan_because: entrepreneurship is a powerful weapon in the fight against poverty.

lenders.name: Frozen Spokes
lenders.loan_because: We are interested in supporting the uplifting effect micro finance has on those who have the least access to sources of capital.  The ancient Chinese philosopher, Lao Tzu, once wrote, "Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and you feed him for life."  Rather than simply donating money to a charity for one-time relief, we want to help fan the flame of human drive and ingenuity and realize the multiplier effect lending has on the communities affected by the borrower.
lenders.occupational_info: We manage relationships with companies who bank with us, lend to companies who engage in international trade, and process banking documents associated with trade transactions.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: I gotta spread the love!

lenders.name: The Morris Family
lenders.loan_because: I can and should

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: As much as there are things I cannot afford for my family, we live like Kings to many others on this planet and for that I wish to share what I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a passion and I am working to realise this passion into success.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I like to help those who works hard and truly responsible.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I love the personalized approach.

lenders.name: Jesika Brooks
lenders.loan_because: I think it's good to give, especially when you're capable of sharing the wealth. (Heck, it's good to give even when times are tough.)
